document.full_text: kuwait's cabinet is expected to quit thursday after lawmakers asked to grill three ministers, the latest in a series of challenges by an unusually assertive arab parliament that have delayed important economic reforms.
document.title: kuwait government set to quit over questioning: sources
lines_and_colors: kuwait's cabinet is expected to quit thursday after lawmakers asked to grill three ministers, the latest in a series of challenges by an unusually assertive arab parliament that have delayed important economic reforms.
